Texts.Chs: 把^orange;电路板^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;circuit board^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Encouraging: You will need a large amount of circuits, for they are the building block of many more advanced chipsets.

Texts.Chs: 指导：现在你有了硅和铜线，为什么不在^orange;加工台^reset;里做一个^orange;电路板^reset;呢？
Texts.Eng: Instructive: Now that you have silicon and wire why not combine the two at your ^orange;matter assembler^reset; and craft a ^orange;Circuit Board^reset;?
